Variable.Name: LOAD_UP_TO_DATE
Variable.Query: select nvl( max( F.INVL_INVE_DATE_WID ) , 19000101) from DWH_DMT.W_INVOICELINE_F F

Variable.Name: VAR_PARTITION_NAME
Variable.Query: SELECT NVL(c.partition_name,'P9999') FROM dual d left JOIN (SELECT partition_name FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT 'P' ||INVL_INVE_DATE_CODE partition_name FROM dwh_sto.s_invoiceline_o MINUS SELECT partition_name FROM all_tab_partitions WHERE table_name = 'W_INVOICELINE_F' AND num_rows != 0 ) ORDER BY partition_name ) c on ( 1=1 and rownum =1 )

Variable.Name: GLOBAL_VAR_PARTITION_NAME
Variable.Query: SELECT NVL(c.partition_name,'P9999') FROM dual d left JOIN (SELECT partition_name FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT 'P' ||INVL_INVE_DATE_CODE partition_name FROM dwh_sto.s_invoiceline_o MINUS SELECT partition_name FROM all_tab_partitions WHERE table_name = 'W_INVOICELINE_F' AND num_rows != 0 ) ORDER BY partition_name ) c on ( 1=1 and rownum =1 )
